abstract: Books Empire of Cotton: A Global History by Sven Beckert and Empire of Necessity: Slavery, Freedom, and Deception in the New World by Greg Grandin win Bancroft Prize.
lead_paragraph: Books on the international cotton trade and on the shipboard slave revolt that inspired Herman Melville’s short story “Benito Cereno” have won this year’s prize.

headline.main: Globally Minded Books Win Bancroft Prize
headline.print_headline: Globally Minded Books Win Bancroft Prize

snippet: Books on the international cotton trade and on the shipboard slave revolt that inspired Herman Melville’s short story “Benito Cereno” have won this year’s prize.
